lessons.description: Ideal for younger beginning trumpet players or adult students on a lunch break
Ideal for intermediate to advanced students or beginning adult students
Ideal for younger beginning horn players or adult students on a lunch break
Ideal for intermediate to advanced students or beginning adult students
Ideal for the young beginning pianist; includes Music Theory lessons
Not in Charlotte? Virtual option available, but may not be the right fit for everyone

comments.author: Sarah
comments.text: I used to be so bad at the trumpet that my dead grandmother could play it better, but lessons with Cassie have helped me improve!

comments.author: Timmy
comments.text: Cassie has helped my hone my skills on Horn - especially my ear! I now can bet the family farm that I'll play in the right register every time.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.text: I have always regretted my decision to quit trumpet lessons so I could focus on football when I was a kid. Cassie has helped me enjoy playing the trumpet again with no judgement and endless encouragement. I urge any other adult who is afraid it's too late to learn or re-learn music to just GO FOR IT!

comments.author: Karen
comments.text: My daughter LOVES going to piano lessons with Cassie. On a scale of 1 to 5 - 1 being she'd rather eat a plate of broccoli and 5 being becoming a unicorn - piano lessons are a solid 4.5. I ususally don't have nice things to say about teachers or retail workers or servers or...you get the picture, but Cassie gets 5 stars in my book!

comments.author: Michael
comments.text: I feel so much more confident in my musical abilities after taking lessons with Cassie. She is an excellent motivator and encourager. Highly recommend!
